LanguageData.NR_AutoMachineTool_MaterialEnergy.label: Material Energy
LanguageData.NR_AutoMachineTool_MaterialEnergy.descri: It can be converted into a material with a Material Converter.
LanguageData.NR_AutoMachineTool_MaterialMachine.label: Material Converter
LanguageData.NR_AutoMachineTool_MaterialMachine.descr: It converts from material to energy, energy to material. Those converted into energy can be generated from energy.
